divs: Sighting Detailslooking toward the straight upward I notice a bright point of light as i amwriting this ,it is still visible. possibly a star but I have never seen astar from the night sky visible a 230 pm in the after noon. I just thoughtis worth reporting It is nearly straight abovre me slightly toward the north,northeast.....doesnt appear to be moving UPDATE time is now 300 pm, objecthas completely dissappeared....not sure what it was but atmospheric conditionsremain the same.....weird
Summary: point of light above los angelesca 01112004- 238P
